content: Clemens Nylandsted Klokmose Clemens Nylandsted Klokmose Home Teaching CV People Publications (Google Scholar) I am an associate professor in human-computer interaction at the Department of Computer Science at Aarhus University. I am part of the Human-Centered Computing section and affiliated with the Center for Computational Thinking and Design. I lead the Webstrates and the CoTinker project. I co-manage CAVI, a production unit supporting research, teaching and outreach with associated laboratory and exhibition facilities. My research has been generously funded by The Aarhus University Research Foundation, The Carlsberg Foundation, JPI Urban Europe, IT-Vest, Microsoft Research, Adobe Research and the Novo Nordisk Foundation. Find me on Mastodon and Bluesky.
